p: The ML analysis of complete coding regions of the 88 sequences indicates distinct Asian and African lineages. African lineage consists of three independent clusters: Senegal, Uganda, and Nigeria. Asian lineage has caused all the recorded outbreak or endemic circulation of ZIKV in recent decades. All strains imported into China belong to the Asian lineage [Figure S1]. TempEst plot shows a positive correlation between genetic divergence and sampling time in all sequences ( R 2 = 0.649) [Figure S2A]. The correlation becomes stronger within the Asian lineage ( R 2 = 0.996) [Figure S2B]. The plot indicated that the data set contained sufficient temporal signal for molecular clock analysis.
